channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- 800xA, Control Software for AC 800M OPC Server for AC 800M
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- 800xA, Control Software for AC 800M OPC Server for AC 800M

item.title: CVE-2021-22284|2024-09-16T19:56:36.751Z -- abb -- 800xa%2C%20control%20software%20for%20ac%20800m%20opc%20server%20for%20ac%20800m
item.description: Incorrect Permission Assignment for Critical Resource vulnerability in OPC Server for AC 800M allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the node running the AC800M OPC Server.
